description:
Ted is a good example of what I like in a guy. Straight, lean, and a nice, natural body hair pattern.
He came out to meet with me on his lunch hour. If you look close you'll probably be able to guess what he does for a living.
Ted has really pretty eyes and a nice smile. I also liked his nice-sized cock and hairy balls. Plus, he didn't seem all that uncomfortable in front of the camera.
title: Ted
